channel.title: Can I implement blockchain technology to the mobile app which is not related to online transactions?
channel.description:
Hi brothers, I have a question relating to Blockchain technology. The question is, **Can I implement blockchain technology to the mobile app which is not related to online transactions?** :slightly_smiling_face: Because I have an idea to develop an app with ML object recognition, top of blockchain technology (for a secure data transmission between the app and AWS).
**> Is this possible?** :slightly_smiling_face:

item.title: Can I implement blockchain technology to the mobile app which is not related to online transactions?
item.dc:creator: system
item.description:
This topic was automatically closed 3 days after the last reply. New replies are no longer allowed.

Read full topic

Hi brothers,
I have a question relating to Blockchain technology. The question is, Can I implement blockchain technology to the mobile app which is not related to online transactions?
Because I have an idea to develop an app with ML object recognition, top of blockchain technology (for a secure data transmission between the app and AWS).
